phrase: I heard a snap and instant pain when I was on the trampoline.

I tried to elevate it and that was about it.
I don't monitor my blood pressures at home.

There’s ecchymosis and edema along the lateral aspect of the knee.
No effusion and decent range of motion, but pain with movement.
